message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $11,000. This is a significant discount from my initial price, and I'm confident the product will be worth more to you than that in the long run. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am still unable to meet your price of $11,000. I would like to propose an offer of $10,500. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value I seek from the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I need to make at least $11,000 to make this worthwhile for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,750.  This is my final offer.
